title: Produce count contains the quantity of the system topic
description:
BUG REPORT

  1. Please describe the issue you observed:
  • What did you do (The steps to reproduce)?

  1. switch consume mode to Pop
  2. send one message
  3. start consumer

  • What is expected to see?

Produce count does not include the quantity of the system topic

  • What did you see instead?

  1. Please tell us about your environment: develop

  2. Other information (e.g. detailed explanation, logs, related issues, suggestions on how to fix, etc):
